review.reviewBody:
Lacha Paratha combo - BEST
Egg Bhurji - BEST
Tawa Roti - BEST
Sirka Onion - BEST 
Salt was perfect. Otherwise, most of the time In a spicy dish only chillies are added, salt is less. And spices are not balanced
I ordered non veg thali from this restaurant. It was so delicious .
